title: Manage Concrete Test Cylinder Samples
description: During a concrete pour, a technician takes test cylinders. The site manager must ensure they are correctly labeled and stored before being picked up by the lab.

tasks.description: Log the ID numbers of the test cylinders taken during the pour.
tasks.expected_outcome: The cylinder IDs are recorded in the quality log.

tasks.description: Verify the cylinders are labeled with the pour date, location, and sample ID.
tasks.expected_outcome: The labels are confirmed to be correct.

tasks.description: Schedule a pickup with the testing lab for the next day.
tasks.expected_outcome: The lab confirms they will pick up the samples.
